Planner¶

class coop.planner.CoopPlanner(initial_position, goal_positions, walls, seq_sorting_choice=<class 'coop.strategies.GroupLengthStrategy'>)[source]¶

Class representing a cooperative entity that calculates the path of all of its players and defines a sequence of groups of players whose paths do not cross each other

Adds a new goal for the given player

args:
